content: As I'm entering a draft LIVD Connetathon proposal/track, it suggests there be a Skype stream for this as well, but suspect it means Zulip, yet there is no Connectathon under which to put it. Am I missing something (Probably!)?

Feel free to edit the template to refer to chat.fhir.org. Typically we capture connectathon in domain streams - so genomics, questionnaire, bulk data, cda to fhir, etc. If there isn't a stream, you can either create a new stream (if you think there's a sufficient sized community of interest) or you can create a thread under Implementers
Okido. OO will do then for now.
